Security at ICON Industries

Our commitment: At ICON Industries, we prioritise security at every level — from device hardware and software, through operational practices, to data protection and user privacy.

Device Security & Hardening

We deploy industry-leading mobile devices, including Apple iPhones, Samsung Galaxy devices, and Google Pixel phones. Each device benefits from robust hardware security modules like Apple's Secure Enclave, Samsung Knox Vault, and Google’s Titan M2 chip.

We implement strict OS hardening practices such as lockdown modes, verified boot processes, and enforce regular security patching schedules to mitigate vulnerabilities.

Our configurations include biometric protection, hardware-backed key storage, and encrypted data at rest and in transit.
